mapper.select:
SELECT t.travelRouteNo , t.userId, t.subject, t.content, t.hit, t.registerTime,m.addr1, m.areacode, m.firstimage, m.mapX, m.mapY, m.title, m.step FROM TravelRoute t LEFT JOIN Marker m ON t.travelRouteNo = m.travelRouteNo
AND t.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TravelRoute (userId, subject, content, hit, registerTime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hit}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d %H:%i'))
INSERT INTO Marker (addr1, areacode, firstimage, mapX, mapY, title, travelRouteNo, step) VALUES (#{addr1}, #{areacode}, #{firstimage}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{title}, #{travelRouteNo}, #{step})
INSERT INTO sharedTravelRoute (travelRouteNo, title, content) VALUES (#{travelRouteNo}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sharedTravelRouteNo, t.travelRouteNo, t.userId, s.title as subject, s.content, t.hit, t.registerTime, m.addr1, m.areacode, m.firstimage, m.mapX, m.mapY, m.title, m.step FROM sharedTravelRoute s LEFT JOIN TravelRoute t ON s.travelRouteNo = t.travelRouteNo LEFT JOIN Marker m ON t.travelRouteNo = m.travelRouteNo

SELECT s.sharedTravelRouteNo, t.travelRouteNo, t.userId, s.title as subject, s.content, t.hit, t.registerTime, m.addr1, m.areacode, m.firstimage, m.mapX, m.mapY, m.title, m.step FROM sharedTravelRoute s LEFT JOIN TravelRoute t ON s.travelRouteNo = t.travelRouteNo LEFT JOIN Marker m ON t.travelRouteNo = m.travelRouteNo ORDER BY hit DESC LIMIT 6;
